item.title: "48 Hours" show schedule
item.description: True crime. Real justice. To miss it would be a crime.

item.title: The Plot to Eliminate Alyssa Burkett
item.description: A toxic couple orchestrates an elaborate plan to kill a mother. "48 Hours" correspondent Peter Van Sant reports.

item.title: 11/16: CBS Weekend News
item.description: Safety concerns raised after plane struck by bullet in Dallas; How this new car runs without gas or electricity
